name: YOU DESERVE BETTER poster
description: A relic from the cynosure days, there are only EIGHT left. Exclusive photography + words, printed on 100% recycled matte paper.

name: PLEIADES. Limited Print Edition
description: There are only a few copies left. Get it while it's around! The print edition is limited to this single run. --- 94 pages of my heart in one 7.5x7.5 square paperback volume. an anthology of short stories & poetry from 2004 to 2009. 53 stories & poems. published august 2010. ♥ --- If you enjoy short stories, poetry, or bittersweet love, this book is for you. Reviews: "I got your book and it is beautiful and wonderful and I feel like I'm experiencing something out of this world when I read it." - Ngoc Le "...I have to tell you that I LOVE YOUR BOOK! I love every line and every page that I've read and I bet that I'll love the rest that I haven't read yet :) Thank you for this sweet comforting piece of art and please keep on writing ♥" - Zaka "This book is heart-felt and inspiring. An anthology of intimate moments that give you a peek into the mysteries of life and the beauty in them. ♥" - Johnathan Nguyen "...Pleiades [is] a breathtaking, encouraging satisfaction that not many things I have read, and believe me I have read many, can display in words the fragility of a girl’s heart that is hidden by the strength of her beliefs and actions as Pleiades does." - Kathy Fan (click here for full review) "Pleiades leads its readers into the spaces that one rarely sees in literature and in life. Through the use of carefully worded prose and prose-poetry Sui Solitaire clears a pathway to the quiet occurrences that exist in the spaces between actions. [..]Pleiades‘ tales range from humorous to heartbreaking with a narration that is refreshingly introspective and sincere. More than anything else, Solitaire’s wit and passionate nature are scrawled across the pages of this work and the combination of the author’s imagination, diction and obvious love for her readers make Pleiades into a success with which one finds immediate rapport." - Veronica Glover --- Only one printing of this book will ever be available-- so get it while it's still around! Leaves on an exciting journey to your home in 2-3 business days! Thank you for your support :)

name: LIMITED EDITION "face off" Print
description: Only one photograph will be available at any given time, and only an extremely limited number of prints of each photograph will ever be released publicly, so buy one while they’re still around! ♥ Thank you for your interest and support :) --- Only 10 prints of this photo will EVER be available to the public, so get this limited edition print now! 16x20 matte print. If you are buying internationally, please email me at hello(at)iurisandthesea.com so we can work out the shipping. Currently only 7 of 10 available. 5% of all proceeds go to Children's Tumor Foundation.
